metrics.name: Aggregated CPU Load
metrics.desc: The percentage of time that all the CPU's (aggregated) are busy.

metrics.name: Application Time
metrics.desc: The time elapsed from the application start.

metrics.name: CPU 00 Frequency
metrics.desc: The frequency of CPU 00.

metrics.name: CPU 00 Load
metrics.desc: The percentage of time that CPU 00 is busy.

metrics.name: CPU 01 Frequency
metrics.desc: The frequency of CPU 01.

metrics.name: CPU 01 Load
metrics.desc: The percentage of time that CPU 01 is busy.

metrics.name: CPU 02 Frequency
metrics.desc: The frequency of CPU 02.

metrics.name: CPU 02 Load
metrics.desc: The percentage of time that CPU 02 is busy.

metrics.name: CPU 03 Frequency
metrics.desc: The frequency of CPU 03.

metrics.name: CPU 03 Load
metrics.desc: The percentage of time that CPU 03 is busy.

metrics.name: CPU 04 Frequency
metrics.desc: The frequency of CPU 04.

metrics.name: CPU 04 Load
metrics.desc: The percentage of time that CPU 04 is busy.

metrics.name: CPU 05 Frequency
metrics.desc: The frequency of CPU 05.

metrics.name: CPU 05 Load
metrics.desc: The percentage of time that CPU 05 is busy.

metrics.name: Target App CPU Load
metrics.desc: The percentage of the CPU that the target application utilized.

metrics.name: AnyRingBusy
metrics.desc: The percentage of time when any command streamer was busy.

metrics.name: Blitter Ring Busy
metrics.desc: The percentage of time when blitter command streamer was busy.

metrics.name: GPU Busy
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which the GPU has been processing GPU commands.

metrics.name: GPU Core Clocks
metrics.desc: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

metrics.name: GPU Duration
metrics.desc: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.

metrics.name: GPU Frequency
metrics.desc: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.

metrics.name: Render Ring Busy
metrics.desc: The percentage of time when render command streamer was busy.

metrics.name: Vdbox0 Ring Busy
metrics.desc: The percentage of time when Vdbox0 command streamer was busy.

metrics.name: Vebox Ring Busy
metrics.desc: The percentage of time when vebox command streamer was busy.

metrics.name: Slice0 PS Output Available
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 PS output is available

metrics.name: Slice0 Pixel Values Ready
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 pixel values are ready

metrics.name: Samples Blended
metrics.desc: The total number of blended samples or pixels written to all render targets.

metrics.name: Samples Written
metrics.desc: The total number of samples or pixels written to all render targets.

metrics.name: Samples Killed in PS
metrics.desc: The total number of samples or pixels dropped in pixel shaders.

metrics.name: Rasterized Pixels
metrics.desc: The total number of rasterized pixels.

metrics.name: Early Depth Test Fails
metrics.desc: The total number of pixels dropped on early depth test.

metrics.name: Early Hi-Depth Test Fails
metrics.desc: The total number of pixels dropped on early hierarchical depth test.

metrics.name: Polygon Data Ready
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which geometry pipeline output is ready

metrics.name: CS FPU0 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU FPU0 pipeline was actively processing a compute shader instruction.

metrics.name: CS FPU1 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU FPU1 pipeline was actively processing a compute shader instruction.

metrics.name: EU AVG IPC Rate
metrics.desc: The average rate of IPC calculated for 2 FPU pipelines.

metrics.name: EU Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were actively processing.

metrics.name: EU Stall
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which the Execution Units were stalled.

metrics.name: EU Thread Occupancy
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which hardware threads occupied EUs.

metrics.name: HS/DS/GS FPU0 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: HS/DS/GS FPU0 Pipe Active

metrics.name: HS/DS/GS FPU1 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: HS/DS/GS FPU1 Pipe Active

metrics.name: CS Threads Dispatched
metrics.desc: The total number of compute shader hardware threads dispatched.

metrics.name: DS Threads Dispatched
metrics.desc: The total number of domain shader hardware threads dispatched.

metrics.name: GS Threads Dispatched
metrics.desc: The total number of geometry shader hardware threads dispatched.

metrics.name: HS Threads Dispatched
metrics.desc: The total number of hull shader hardware threads dispatched.

metrics.name: EU Both FPU Pipes Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which both EU FPU pipelines were actively processing.

metrics.name: EU FPU0 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU FPU0 pipeline was actively processing.

metrics.name: EU FPU1 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU FPU1 pipeline was actively processing.

metrics.name: EU Send Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU send pipeline was actively processing.

metrics.name: PS FPU0 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU FPU0 pipeline was actively processing a pixel shader instruction.

metrics.name: PS FPU1 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU FPU1 pipeline was actively processing a pixel shader instruction.

metrics.name: PS Send Pipeline Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU send pipeline was actively processing a pixel shader instruction.

metrics.name: PS Threads Dispatched
metrics.desc: The total number of pixel shader hardware threads dispatched.

metrics.name: VS FPU0 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU FPU0 pipeline was actively processing a vertex shader instruction.

metrics.name: VS FPU1 Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU FPU1 pipeline was actively processing a vertex shader instruction.

metrics.name: VS Send Pipe Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which EU send pipeline was actively processing a vertex shader instruction.

metrics.name: VS Threads Dispatched
metrics.desc: The total number of vertex shader hardware threads dispatched.

metrics.name: GTI Read Throughput
metrics.desc: The total number of GPU memory bytes read from GTI.

metrics.name: GTI Write Throughput
metrics.desc: The total number of GPU memory bytes written to GTI.

metrics.name: GtiMemoryReads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads.

metrics.name: GtiMemoryWrites
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory writes.

metrics.name: SQ is full
metrics.desc: The percentage of time when SQ is filled above a threshold (usually 48 entries)

metrics.name: GtiCmdStreamerMemoryReads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads from Command Streamer.

metrics.name: GtiCmdStreamerMemoryWrites
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory writes from Command Streamer.

metrics.name: GtiRsMemoryReads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads from Resource Streamer.

metrics.name: GtiSoMemoryWrites
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory writes from Stream Output.

metrics.name: GtiVfMemoryReads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads from Vertex Fetch.

metrics.name: GtiMscMemoryReads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads from Multisampling Color Cache (Multisampling Color Cache misses).

metrics.name: GtiMscMemoryWrites
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory writes from Multisampling Color Cache (Multisampling Color Cache invalidations).

metrics.name: GtiRccMemoryReads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads from Render Color Cache (Render Color Cache misses).

metrics.name: GtiRccMemoryWrites
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory writes from Render Color Cache (Render Color Cache invalidations).

metrics.name: GtiHizMemoryReads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads from Hierarchical Depth Cache (Hi-Depth Cache misses).

metrics.name: GtiHizMemoryWrites
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory writes from Hierarchical Depth Cache.

metrics.name: GtiRczMemoryReads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads from Render Depth Cache (Render Depth Cache misses).

metrics.name: GtiRczMemoryWrites
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory writes from Render Depth Cache.

metrics.name: GtiStcMemoryReads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads from Stencil Cache (Stencil Cache misses).

metrics.name: GtiStcMemoryWrites
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory writes from Stencil Cache.

metrics.name: GtiL3Reads
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory reads from L3 (L3 Cache misses).

metrics.name: GtiL3Writes
metrics.desc: The total number of GTI memory writes from L3 (L3 invalidations).

metrics.name: Slice0 L3 Bank0 Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 L3 bank0 is active

metrics.name: Slice0 L3 Bank0 Stalled
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 L3 bank0 is stalled

metrics.name: Slice0 L3 Bank1 Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 L3 bank1 is active

metrics.name: Slice0 L3 Bank1 Stalled
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 L3 bank1 is stalled

metrics.name: Slice0 L3 Bank2 Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 L3 bank2 is active

metrics.name: Slice0 L3 Bank2 Stalled
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 L3 bank2 is stalled

metrics.name: Slice0 L3 Bank3 Active
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 L3 bank3 is active

metrics.name: Slice0 L3 Bank3 Stalled
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 L3 bank3 is stalled

metrics.name: Slice0 Rasterizer Input Available
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 rasterizer input is available

metrics.name: Slice0 Rasterizer Output Ready
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 rasterizer output is ready

metrics.name: Slice0 Post-EarlyZ Pixel Data Ready
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 post-EarlyZ pixel data is ready (after early Z tests have been applied)

metrics.name: Samplers Bottleneck
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which samplers have been slowing down the pipe when processing EU requests.

metrics.name: Samplers Busy
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which samplers have been processing EU requests.

metrics.name: Slice0 Subslice0 Input Available
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 subslice0 sampler input is available

metrics.name: Slice0 Subslice0 Sampler Output Ready
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 subslice0 sampler output is ready

metrics.name: Slice0 Subslice1 Input Available
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 subslice1 sampler input is available

metrics.name: Slice0 Subslice1 Sampler Output Ready
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 subslice1 sampler output is ready

metrics.name: Slice0 Subslice2 Input Available
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 subslice2 sampler input is available

metrics.name: Slice0 Subslice2 Sampler Output Ready
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which slice0 subslice2 sampler output is ready

metrics.name: Sampler Cache Misses
metrics.desc: The total number of sampler cache misses in all LODs in all sampler units.

metrics.name: Sampler Texels
metrics.desc: The total number of texels seen on input (with 2x2 accuracy) in all sampler units.

metrics.name: STC PMA stall
metrics.desc: Percentage of time when stencil cache line and an overlapping pixel are causing stalls

metrics.name: NonPS Thread Ready For Dispatch on Slice0 Subslice0
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which non-PS thread is ready for dispatch on slice0 subslice0 thread dispatcher

metrics.name: NonPS Thread Ready For Dispatch on Slice0 Subslice1
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which non-PS thread is ready for dispatch on slice0 subslice1 thread dispatcher

metrics.name: NonPS Thread Ready For Dispatch on Slice0 Subslice2
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which non-PS thread is ready for dispatch on slice0 subslice2 thread dispatcher

metrics.name: PS Thread Ready For Dispatch on Slice0 Subslice0
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which PS thread is ready for dispatch on slice0 subslice0 thread dispatcher

metrics.name: PS Thread Ready For Dispatch on Slice0 Subslice1
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which PS thread is ready for dispatch on slice0 subslice1 thread dispatcher

metrics.name: PS Thread Ready For Dispatch on Slice0 Subslice2
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which PS thread is ready for dispatch on slice0 subslice2 thread dispatcher

metrics.name: Thread Header Ready on Slice0 Subslice0 Port 0
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which thread header is ready on slice0 subslice0 thread dispatcher port 0

metrics.name: Thread Header Ready on Slice0 Subslice0 Port 1
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which thread header is ready on slice0 subslice0 thread dispatcher port 1

metrics.name: Thread Header Ready on Slice0 Subslice1 Port 0
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which thread header is ready on slice0 subslice1 thread dispatcher port 0

metrics.name: Thread Header Ready on Slice0 Subslice1 Port 1
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which thread header is ready on slice0 subslice1 thread dispatcher port 1

metrics.name: Thread Header Ready on Slice0 Subslice2 Port 0
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which thread header is ready on slice0 subslice2 thread dispatcher port 0

metrics.name: Thread Header Ready on Slice0 Subslice2 Port 1
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which thread header is ready on slice0 subslice2 thread dispatcher port 1

metrics.name: VME Busy
metrics.desc: The percentage of time in which VME (IME or CRE) was actively processing data.

metrics.name: Draw Calls
metrics.desc: Number of draw calls

metrics.name: FPS
metrics.desc: Frame Rate

metrics.name: Frame Number
metrics.desc: Frame Number

metrics.name: Frame Time
metrics.desc: The time elapsed between two subsequent SwapBuffer calls

metrics.name: GPU Time Elapsed
metrics.desc: GPU Time Elapsed in microseconds

metrics.name: RT Changes
metrics.desc: Number of SetRenderTargets calls

metrics.name: Shader Creations
metrics.desc: Number of CreateShader calls

metrics.name: State Block Applies
metrics.desc: Number of Apply calls

metrics.name: State Block Captures
metrics.desc: Number of Capture calls

metrics.name: State Changes
metrics.desc: Number of DX state calls

metrics.name: Texture Creations
metrics.desc: Number of CreateTexture calls

metrics.name: Buffer Creations
metrics.desc: Number of CreateBuffer calls

metrics.name: Buffer Maps
metrics.desc: Number of DX Buffer maps

metrics.name: Maps
metrics.desc: Number of DX maps

metrics.name: RT Clears
metrics.desc: Number of ClearRenderTargetView calls

metrics.name: Resource Copies
metrics.desc: Number of CopyResource calls

metrics.name: Resource Creations
metrics.desc: Number of Direct3D resources creations

metrics.name: Subresource Copies
metrics.desc: Number of CopySubresource calls

metrics.name: Subresource Updates
metrics.desc: Number of UpdateSubresource calls

metrics.name: Texture1D Maps
metrics.desc: Number of 1D Texture maps

metrics.name: Texture2D Maps
metrics.desc: Number of 2D Texture maps

metrics.name: Texture3D Maps
metrics.desc: Number of 3D Texture maps

metrics.name: Z/Stencil Clears
metrics.desc: Number of ClearDepthStencilView calls

metrics.name: Clears
metrics.desc: Number of IDirect3DDevice9::Clear calls

metrics.name: Color Fills
metrics.desc: Number of IDirect3DDevice9::ColorFill calls

metrics.name: IB Creations
metrics.desc: Number of IDirect3DDevice9::CreateIndexBuffer calls

metrics.name: IB Lock Time
metrics.desc: Time spent in DX index buffer locks (microseconds)

metrics.name: IB Locks
metrics.desc: Number of DX index buffer locks

metrics.name: Lock Time
metrics.desc: Time spent in DX lock calls

metrics.name: Locks
metrics.desc: Number of DX locks

metrics.name: RT Data Gets
metrics.desc: Number of IDirect3DDevice9::GetRenderTargetData calls

metrics.name: Resource Creations
metrics.desc: Number of Direct3D9 resources creations

metrics.name: Stretch Rects
metrics.desc: Number of IDirect3DDevice9::StretchRect calls

metrics.name: Surface Creations
metrics.desc: Number of IDirect3DDevice9::CreateSurface calls

metrics.name: Surface Lock Time
metrics.desc: Time spent in DX surface locks (microseconds)

metrics.name: Surface Locks
metrics.desc: Number of DX surface resource locks

metrics.name: Surface Updates
metrics.desc: Number of IDirect3DDevice9::UpdateSurface calls

metrics.name: VB Creations
metrics.desc: Number of IDirect3DDevice9::CreateVertexBuffer calls

metrics.name: VB Lock Time
metrics.desc: Time spent in DX vertex buffer locks (microseconds)

metrics.name: VB Locks
metrics.desc: Number of DX vertex buffer locks

metrics.name: Volume Lock Time
metrics.desc: Time spent in DX volume locks (microseconds)

metrics.name: Volume Locks
metrics.desc: Number of DX volume resource locks

metrics.name: Buffer Creations
metrics.desc: Number of Buffer Creations

metrics.name: Error Gets
metrics.desc: Number of glGetError Calls

metrics.name: Indexed Draw Calls
metrics.desc: Number of Indexed Draw Calls

metrics.name: Indexed Vertex Count
metrics.desc: Number of Indexed Vertices

metrics.name: RT Clears
metrics.desc: Number of Clear Calls

metrics.name: Vertex Count
metrics.desc: Number of Vertices

metrics.name: BindBuffer Calls
metrics.desc: Number of Buffers Bound

metrics.name: BindTexture Calls
metrics.desc: Number of Textures Bound

metrics.name: UseProgram Calls
metrics.desc: Number of Programs Bound

metrics.name: CS Invocations
metrics.desc: The number of times a compute shader was invoked.

metrics.name: Clipper Invocations
metrics.desc: The number of primitives sent to the Clipper.

metrics.name: DS Invocations
metrics.desc: The number of times a domain shader was invoked.

metrics.name: GS Invocations
metrics.desc: The number of times a geometry shader was invoked (as per DX documentation).

metrics.name: HS Invocations
metrics.desc: The number of times a hull shader was invoked.

metrics.name: PS Invocations
metrics.desc: The number of times a pixel shader was invoked. Direct3D invokes a pixel shader once per pixel (as per DX documentation).

metrics.name: Pixels Rendered
metrics.desc: The number of pixels that passed z-testing. Note: not all rendered pixels are necessarily written to render targets.

metrics.name: Post-Clip Primitives
metrics.desc: The number of primitives that flowed out of the Clipper.

metrics.name: Post-GS Primitives
metrics.desc: The number of primitives that flowed through from GS to the clipper if GS was enabled.

metrics.name: Primitive Count
metrics.desc: The number of rendering primitives assembled and put into the input assembly stage of the pipeline.

metrics.name: VS Invocations
metrics.desc: The number of times a vertex shader was invoked. Direct3D invokes the vertex shader once per vertex (as per DX documentation).

metrics.name: Vertex Count
metrics.desc: The number of vertices that entered the pipeline.
